performance_metrics.name: Latency (Maximum)
performance_metrics.description: Maximum acceptable delay between data generation and processing response. Critical for real-time control applications.

performance_metrics.name: Throughput (Data Volume)
performance_metrics.description: Maximum data volume processed per unit of time. Dependent on application and data frequency.

performance_metrics.name: Processing Power (CPU)
performance_metrics.description: Aggregate processing capability of the edge computing nodes. Determined by workload complexity.

performance_metrics.name: Memory (RAM)
performance_metrics.description: Total system memory. Required for data buffering, application storage, and OS operations.

performance_metrics.name: Storage (Local)
performance_metrics.description: Local storage for temporary data, logs, and critical application data. SSD recommended.

performance_metrics.name: Network Bandwidth (Local)
performance_metrics.description: Bandwidth required for communication between edge nodes and central servers.

performance_metrics.name: Availability (Uptime)
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of time the system is operational and accessible. Critical for continuous monitoring applications.

implementation_requirements.name: Network Connectivity
implementation_requirements.specification: Redundant Ethernet connections (Dual 1 Gbps+), Cellular backup (LTE Cat M1 or 5G NB-IoT)
implementation_requirements.description: Reliable and secure network connection is paramount.  Consider 5G for higher bandwidth requirements.

implementation_requirements.name: Security
implementation_requirements.specification: AES-256 encryption, TLS 1.2+, Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA), Network Segmentation
implementation_requirements.description: Protect sensitive data and prevent unauthorized access. Implement a robust security posture.

implementation_requirements.name: Redundancy
implementation_requirements.specification: Dual power supplies, redundant network interfaces, Hot Standby Edge Nodes (at least 2), Automated Failover Protocols
implementation_requirements.description: Ensure continuous operation in case of hardware or network failures.

implementation_requirements.name: Scalability
implementation_requirements.specification: Modular architecture, Support for containerization (Docker, Kubernetes), API-driven interfaces
implementation_requirements.description: Design for future expansion and integration with other systems.

implementation_requirements.name: Monitoring & Management
implementation_requirements.specification: Centralized Management Console, Real-time System Health Dashboards, Automated Alerting, Remote Diagnostics
implementation_requirements.description: Enable proactive monitoring, troubleshooting, and system optimization.

implementation_requirements.name: Compliance
implementation_requirements.specification: ISO 27001, GDPR, Industry-Specific Regulations (e.g., FDA for Pharma)
implementation_requirements.description: Adhere to relevant regulatory requirements and industry best practices.

operational_considerations: Power Consumption: Monitor and optimize power usage, especially in remote deployments.
Thermal Management: Implement cooling solutions to prevent overheating.
Data Governance: Establish clear data ownership, access control, and retention policies.
Skills Gap: Train personnel on edge computing technologies and operations.
Connectivity Costs:  Factor in ongoing network bandwidth and data transfer costs.
Remote Management:  Establish procedures for remote system administration and troubleshooting.
